title: Jurors disqualified, exempted, or excused
context: ยง612-21 Jurors disqualified, exempted, or excused. Whenever a juror has been disqualified, exempted, or excused, that fact shall be noted, and the juror shall not be subject to service for the period of time commensurate with the nature and circumstances of the juror&rsquo;s disqualification, exemption, or excuse. [L 1973, c 191, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1993; am L 2007, c 122, ยง15]
